sources.title: A Pair of Briefs
sources.description: Title: A Pair of Briefs Summary: She's new in chambers, and he's a troublemaker. But what *is* the true status of the old lady's wartime marriage, and can the two young legal minds find the answer? Directed by: Ralph Thomas Actors: Michael Craig, Mary Peach, Brenda de Banzie Production Company: The Rank Organisation Release Date: 2 October 1962 (USA) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG A recently-qualified barrister is annoyed when he finds his firm is taking on the boss's niece. The two youngsters soon find themselves in court on opposite sides in a case on the restitution of conjugal rights where both plaintiff and defendant seem to have things to hide. The irascible and rather fearsome judge has little time for the goings-on, least of all the way the two young lawyers seem rather too keen to squabble with each other.
